title: もぐもぐ、ガタゴト、主人公

text_block_list.text: Three years after starting to challenge the Twinkle Series, one afternoon when things had finally settled down.

text_block_list.name: Woman A
text_block_list.text: 'Because she's an ordinary girl, seeing her win really gave me courage!'

text_block_list.name: News Caster
text_block_list.text: 'Matikanetannhauser's victory in the Arima Kinen gave courage to many people—'
While watching the news, Matikanetannhauser came to visit.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Want to go to my hometown with me?
choice_data_list: Sure, but why all of a sudden?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hehe, we got to talking about having a picnic with my parents.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: And since they said they'd treat us, I thought you could come along too, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Um, we're supposed to meet around here...?

text_block_list.name: Tannhauser's Mother
text_block_list.text: Ah, there you are, Tannhauser~!
A couple carrying a large tiered box came toward us, waving their hands.

text_block_list.name: Tannhauser's Father
text_block_list.text: Sorry we're late, we got caught up preparing. Thanks for always taking care of our daughter~.

text_block_list.name: Tannhauser's Mother
text_block_list.text: Fufu, she said she was bringing someone important, so I got all flustered.

text_block_list.name: Tannhauser's Mother
text_block_list.text: We both put our hearts into it, so please enjoy yourselves today.

text_block_list.name: Tannhauser's Mother
text_block_list.text: ...But still, I can't believe it!

text_block_list.name: Tannhauser's Mother
text_block_list.text: To think such an honest-looking person was her boyfriend! You're not bad, Tannhauser!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: W-wait, he's not my boyfriend!? Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Tannhauser's Mother
text_block_list.text: ...Oh, oops, is that how it is!?
Anyway, we decided to move to find a suitable spot.

text_block_list.name: Tannhauser's Father
text_block_list.text: I thought we'd cook something like shark fin soup since it's a special occasion, but I couldn't get the flavor right. Sorry it's just ordinary dishes.
The tiered box they laid out... was of such quality that all you could say was 'impressive'...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Whaa...! Trainer!
This is amazing!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Hamburg steak, fried shrimp,
simmered dishes, rolled sushi, rolled omelet...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
They're all super popular side dishes at the shop~!
Thank you, Dad, Mom!

Each and every one was a masterpiece beyond imagination...
I felt like I understood a little where her high-level 'normal' comes from.

text_block_list.name: Tannhauser's Mother
text_block_list.text:
But really, this kid has always been weak
when it really counts.

text_block_list.name: Tannhauser's Mother
text_block_list.text:
When she was selected for the school vs. school Umamusume relay,
she overdid her solo training,
got sick, and ran a high fever on the day of the event.

text_block_list.name: Tannhauser's Father
text_block_list.text:
When she tried to make a feast for Labor Thanksgiving Day,
she made too many test dishes
and ran out of allowance.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah, don't talk about the past so much~!

text_block_list.name: Tannhauser's Mother
text_block_list.text:
But you know, that's why the 'Arima Kinen' was...
so good, wasn't it?

text_block_list.name: Tannhauser's Mother
text_block_list.text:
She won decisively,
and the whole venue erupted in cheers, right...!

text_block_list.name: Tannhauser's Father
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. We both cried.
You did great, Tannhauser.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Dad, Mom...

text_block_list.name: Tannhauser's Father
text_block_list.text:
Thank you too, Trainer.
For supporting this kid all the way to such a big stage.

text_block_list.name: Tannhauser's Father
text_block_list.text:
She's not a kid with flashy brilliance.
But to us, she's a special treasure...

text_block_list.name: Tannhauser's Mother
text_block_list.text:
Seeing this kid shine brighter than anyone
and become known as everyone's courage,
I'm so happy...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Dad, Mom...!

text_block_list.name: Tannhauser's Mother
text_block_list.text:
Eat a lot today!
Sniff...!

The three of them picking at the bento boxes while crying...
It became a moment where I felt the deep love from her parents.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Phew, I'm full...!
That was delicious~.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
But still, I never thought
I'd cry that much.
choice_data_list: I thought you were just emotional

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: No, no, I'm usually normal! It's rare for me to get emotional telling stories from the past.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: But I was so happy! I can't believe those two were that delighted for me.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Really, thank you, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Nah, I couldn't have done it alone~. Ahaha.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: You patiently watched over me, even when I'd mess up at crucial moments.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: And it was you, Trainer, who helped me dig out and understand the most important feelings inside me.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: You gave me the strength to move forward. So... yeah, that's right.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Maybe for these three years, the 'protagonist' inside me has been you, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Just kidding.
And Matikanetannhauser's expression turned somewhat solemn.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Um. I think I'll probably keep messing up from here on out too. Like catching a cold at the worst possible time.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: But still, I feel like you're the only one for me, so that's why—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Even though I'm like this, will you keep walking forward with me from now on?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ehe, I'm glad...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Well then, please take care of me, Trainer.
With a slightly more bashful expression than usual, she gave a small bow.

text_block_list.name: Conductor
text_block_list.text: 'Doors closing. Next stop is—...'

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Ahh, I missed my stop!
The days with her—'normal,' hardworking, and a little bit unreliable—are far from over.
